backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access-controlled user profiles and per-user pattern storage, including save/load operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the retro-funk theme for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app with theme provider and renders the sequencer workspace plus profile dialog and toaster.
frontend/src/audio/drumVoices.ts: Implements synthesized kick, snare, hi-hat, and clap voices using Web Audio API oscillators, noise, filters, and envelopes.
frontend/src/audio/useSequencerAudio.ts: React hook providing sequencer playback with scheduling, per-step triggering, BPM control, and Web Audio integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing and error fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/help/HelpPanel.t: Static help content describing beat creation, pattern management, saving, and tips.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with logo, help dialog, user name display, and login button.
Layout wrapper providing background, header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/patterns/CloudSa: Authenticated UI for saving the active pattern to the cloud and loading saved patterns.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Pattern: Manages pattern selection, creation, and renaming within the local session.
frontend/src/components/sequencer/Sequen: Main sequencer workspace coordinating pattern editing, playback, and save/load panels.
frontend/src/components/sequencer/StepGr: Interactive 16‑step grid allowing toggling of steps for each track with current-step highlighting.
frontend/src/components/sequencer/TrackL: Displays track names with mute and volume controls for each instrument track.
frontend/src/components/sequencer/Transp: Play/stop button and BPM controls for the sequencer transport.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored delegation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to load, save, and manage user profiles and musical patterns through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and a custom retro color theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/state/usePatternSession.ts: Zustand store managing local pattern state including creation, updates, loading, and active pattern selection.
frontend/src/types/music.ts: Defines music sequencer types and helpers for creating patterns and converting to and from backend formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and utilities using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project configuration describing the Funk Maker app’s state, including existing features, image requirements, and metadata. Contains versioning info, feature definitions, and a pending new feature request.
